docstring.long_description:
Setup a message filtering can be set up for each bus.
Where the interface supports it, this is carried out in the hardware or kernel layer - not in Python.
All messages that match at least one filter are returned.
docstring.short_description: Attach a message filter to a CAN bus connection.

parameters.name: CAN_address
parameters.description: The CAN bus address to attach the filter to.

parameters.name: can_id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to filter.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: If true, only matches messages where <received_is_extended> == extended.
